octeon_droq_desc_t Struct Reference

#include <octeon_droq.h>

Detailed Description

Octeon descriptor format.

The descriptor ring is made of descriptors which have 2 64-bit values:

  1. Physical (bus) address of the data buffer.
  2. Physical (bus) address of a octeon_droq_info_t structure. The Octeon device DMA's incoming packets and its information at the address given by these descriptor fields.
